original: VP_1ab/.ajñātamadhyāntasamudbhavāya sarvātmane sarvagatāya tasmai/
analyzed: sarva ātmane sarva gatāya tasmai

original: VP_1cd/.praṇamya devāya manobhavāya khalīkṛtaṃ yena jagat samagram//
analyzed: devāya manobhavāya khalīkṛtam yena jagat samagram

original: VP_2ab/.prajāpatir manmatha eva yasmāt kāmād vinā na prabhavaḥ prajānām/
analyzed: manmathaḥ eva yasmāt kāmāt vinā na prabhavaḥ prajānām

original: VP_2cd/.mahatsu sūkṣmeṣu ca so 'sti devaḥ sarvātmakaḥ sarvagataś ca yasmāt//
analyzed: sūkṣmeṣu ca saḥ asti devaḥ sarva ātmakaḥ sarva gataḥ ca yasmāt

original: VP_3ab/.yasmāt paran nāparam asti kiñcit saukṣmyān mahatvāc ca yataś ca nānyat/
analyzed: parat na aparam asti kiñcid saukṣmyāt mahatvāt ca yatas ca na anyat

original: VP_3cd/.tenedam ekena manobhavena vyāptaṃ jagac chāṛṅgabhṛteva sarvam//
analyzed: ekena manobhavena vyāptam jagat śāṛṅga bhṛtā iva sarvam

original: VP_4ab/.agamyagāmī bhagavān prajeśaḥ śroṇīsahasrāṅkatanuś ca śakraḥ/
analyzed: bhagavān prajā īśaḥ śroṇī sahasra aṅka tanuḥ ca śakraḥ

original: VP_4cd/.caturmukho yena kṛtaś ca śambhu samanmatho maṅgalam ādadhātu//
analyzed: yena kṛtaḥ ca śambhu sa manmathaḥ maṅgalam ādadhātu

original: VP_5ab/.bhagavān api śārṅgarathāṅgadharo bhagavat(t)
analyzed: api śārṅga ratha aṅga dharaḥ

original: vam avāpa yataḥ/
analyzed: vam avāpa yataḥ

original: VP_5cd/.bahavo 'sya bhagā iti tena kṛtaṃ bhagavān iti nāma jagat prathitam//
analyzed: asya bhagāḥ iti tena kṛtam bhagavān iti nāma jagat prathitam

original: VP_6ab/.sītāviyogena bahuni duḥkhāny āptāni rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena/
analyzed: bahuni duḥkhāni āptāni rāmeṇa sa lakṣmaṇena

original: VP_6cd/.tānīha saṃsmṛtya kalau sahasrāṇy aṣṭau tathāṣṭau ca vivāhitāni//
analyzed: saṃsmṛtya kalau sahasrāṇi aṣṭau tathā aṣṭau ca vivāhitāni

original: VP_7ab/.durbhagās tanayavarjitāś ca yā niḥsvasanti vanitāḥ pativratā/
analyzed: tanaya varjitāḥ ca yāḥ niḥsvasanti vanitāḥ pativratā

original: VP_7cd/.tāḥ kudaivavinipātayantritā nānyajanmajanitaiḥ suduskṛtaiḥ//
analyzed: ku daiva vinipāta yantritāḥ na anya janma janitaiḥ su duskṛtaiḥ

original: VP_8ab/.surabhikusumagandhais tarpayitvā dvijedrān śubhatithidivasarkṣe daivavitsaṃpradiṣṭe/
analyzed: tarpayitvā śubha tithi divasa ṛkṣe daiva vid saṃpradiṣṭe

original: VP_8cd/.ubhayakulaviśuddhe jñātaśīle surūpe prathamavayasi dadyāt kanyakāṃ yauvanasthe//
analyzed: jñāta śīle surūpe prathama vayasi dadyāt kanyakām yauvana sthe

original: VP_9ab/.puṣye divase 'thavā kṣaṇe vaivāhyeṣu ca bheṣu kārayet/
analyzed: divase athavā kṣaṇe vaivāhyeṣu ca kārayet

original: VP_9cd/.ghaṭakāramṛdā sulakṣaṇām indrāṇīṃ kuśalena śilpinā//
analyzed: su lakṣaṇām indrāṇīm kuśalena śilpinā

original: VP_10ab/.kusumbharaktāmbarabhūṣaṇojjvalāḥ sādhvyaḥ surūpāḥ subhagāḥ kulodbhavāḥ/
analyzed: sādhvyaḥ surūpāḥ subhagāḥ kula udbhavāḥ

original: VP_10cd/.nadīṃ nayeyuḥ saro 'thavā taṭaṃ kanyām alaṅkṛtya sahendra jāyayā//
analyzed: nayeyuḥ saraḥ athavā taṭam kanyām alaṅkṛtya saha indra jāyayā

original: VP_11ab/.sūrpeṇadikṣu pramadā baliṃ tā datvā sakālīyakagandhadigdhām/
analyzed: pramadāḥ balim tāḥ da tvā sa kālīyaka gandha digdhām

original: VP_11cd/.kusumbharaktāmbaraveṣṭitāṅgīṃ śacīsakāśaṃ pramadā nayeyuḥ//
analyzed: śacī sakāśam pramadāḥ nayeyuḥ

original: VP_12ab/.dadhyodanena haviṣā madhunā ca kanyā saṃpūjya śakradayitāṃ ca salohastā [U. salohahastā]/
analyzed: haviṣā madhunā ca kanyā saṃpūjya śakra dayitām ca sa loha stā u sa loha hastā

original: VP_12cd/.tūṣṇīṃ praṇamya śirasā gṛham eva yāyād devīṃ pragṛhya muditā niyataiś ca keśaiḥ//
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā gṛham eva yāyāt devīm pragṛhya muditā niyataiḥ ca keśaiḥ

original: VP_13ab/.gṛhe stitāṃ [U. sthitāṃ] tāṃ puruhūtapatnīṃ prāṅmadhyāstamayeṣu kanyā/
analyzed: stitām u sthitām tām puruhūta patnīm prāk madhya astamayeṣu kanyā

original: VP_13cd/.sraggandhadhūpaiḥ pratipūjaṇec [U. pratipūjayec] ca pāṇīgrahaṃ yāvad upāgateti//
analyzed: pratipūjayet u pratipūjayet ca pāṇīgraham yāvat upāgatā iti

original: VP_14a/.ratnānīndukaraḥ srajaḥ śubhagatā harmyotpalāny āsavaḥ
analyzed: srajaḥ śubha gatāḥ harmya utpalāni āsavaḥ

original: VP_14b/.tāṃbūlaṃ pravarāmbarāṇi ruciraṃ gītaṃ vibhūtyaś cayā/
analyzed: pravara ambarāṇi ruciram gītam vibhūtyaḥ cayā

original: VP_14c/.yasmān na striyam antareṇa hi nṛṇāṃ sarvāṇy abhiprītaye
analyzed: na striyam antareṇa hi nṛṇām sarvāṇi abhiprītaye

original: VP_14d/.tasmād vacmi tadāptiyogyasamayo dharmārthakāmāya ca//
analyzed: vacmi tad āpti yogya samayaḥ dharma artha kāmāya ca

original: VP_14e/.uktaṃ janmani yat tad eva bhavitā yady aṅganānāṃ phalam/
analyzed: janmani yat tat eva bhavitā yadi aṅganānām phalam

original: VP_14f/.vyartho na tv ayam ādaraṃ pariṇaye tatkālalagnādigaḥ//
analyzed: na tu ayam ādaram pariṇaye tad kāla lagna ādi gaḥ

original: VP_15ab/.ajñātaṃ prathamaṃ pradhānam aparaṃ tadvyañjakaṃ yoṣitām/
VP_15cd/.udvāhe niyati nayaty atibalād velāsamāyuk phalaiḥ//
analyzed: niyati nayati ati balāt velā samāyuj phalaiḥ

original: VP_16a/.vātsyo varṣam anojam icchati tathā ebhyo janaś cottaraṃ
analyzed: varṣam anojam icchati tathā ebhyaḥ janaḥ ca uttaram

original: VP_16b/.strīṇāṃ mānam [U. nāmam] ṛtuṃ vihāya munayo māṇḍavyaśiṣyā jaguḥ/
analyzed: mānam u nāmam ṛtum vihāya munayaḥ māṇḍavya śiṣyāḥ jaguḥ

original: VP_16c/.caitraṃ projjhya parāśāro kathayate durbhāgyadaṃ yoṣitāṃ
analyzed: projjhya kathayate durbhāgya dam yoṣitām

original: VP_16d/.āṣāḍhādicatuṣṭayena śubhadaṃ kaiś cit pradiṣṭaṃ dvijaiḥ//
analyzed: śubha dam kaiḥ cit pradiṣṭam dvijaiḥ

original: VP_17ab/.śreṣṭhaṃ pakṣam uṣanti śuklam asitasyādyaṃ tribhāgaṃ tathā/
analyzed: pakṣam śuklam asitasya ādyam tri bhāgam tathā

original: VP_17cd/.riktāṃ projjhya tithiṃ tathā tv ayanayoḥ sandhiṃ ca śeṣāḥ śubhāḥ//
analyzed: projjhya tithim tathā tu ayanayoḥ sandhim ca śeṣāḥ śubhāḥ

original: VP_18ab/.āgneyagrahavāsareṣu kalahaḥ prītis tu satsūttamān [U. satsūttamā]/
analyzed: kalahaḥ prītiḥ tu satsu uttamān u satsu uttamā

original: VP_18cd/.kaiścit stharyam uṣanti sauradivase cāndre samāpatnikam//
analyzed: stharyam saura divase cāndre samāpatnikam

original: VP_19ab/.mṛgaśirasi maghāyāṃ hastamitrottarāsu svasananirṛtipūṣādhātṛdeveṣu coḍhā/
analyzed: maghāyām hasta mitra uttarāsu svasana nirṛti pūṣā dhātṛ deveṣu ca ūḍhā

original: VP_19cd/.bahusutaśukha [U. sukha]dāsīvittasaubhāgyayuktā janayati paritoṣaṃ kanyakā bāndhavānām//
analyzed: sukha dāsī vitta saubhāgya yuktā janayati paritoṣam kanyakā bāndhavānām

original: VP_20ab/.ārdrādye bhacatuṣṭaye vidhavatā sāgneyayāmye smṛtā/
analyzed: bha catuṣṭaye vidhavatā sā āgneya yāmye smṛtā

original: VP_20cd/.śeṣeṣv akṣayadoṣaśokamaraṇaṃ vyādhyādyaniṣṭaṃ bahuḥ//
analyzed: akṣaya doṣa śoka maraṇam vyādhi ādi aniṣṭam bahuḥ

original: VP_21ab/.prītir janmasu tārakāsu parataḥ sañjñānurūpaṃ phalam/
analyzed: janmasu tārakāsu paratas sañjñā anurūpam phalam

original: VP_21cd/.candre copacayā ''dyasaptamagate saubhāgyasaukhyāptayaḥ//
analyzed: ca upacayāḥ saubhāgya saukhya āptayaḥ

original: VP_22ab/.nakṣatratulyaṃ phalam āha gargaḥ kṣeṇeṣu nakṣatrapasañjñiteṣu
analyzed: phalam āha gargaḥ kṣeṇeṣu nakṣatra pa sañjñiteṣu

original: VP_22cd/.hārītababhrū dvijadevalaś ca viṣṭi vinā 'nyat karaṇaṃ praśastam//
analyzed: dvijadevalaḥ ca viṣṭi vinā anyat karaṇam praśastam

original: VP_23ab/.tithidinakaraṇarkṣalagnavīryaṃ paricayam āha parāśaraḥ krameṇa/
analyzed: paricayam āha parāśaraḥ krameṇa

original: VP_23cd/.tithir iti balabān vadanti gargāḥ karaṇabalād divaso 'pi bhāguriś ca/
analyzed: iti balabān vadanti gargāḥ karaṇa balāt divasaḥ api bhāguriḥ ca

original: VP_23ef/.dinakaraṇabalād bhṛgur bhavīryaṃ balam udayasya jagāda jīvaśarmā//
analyzed: bhṛguḥ bha vīryam balam udayasya jagāda jīvaśarmā

original: VP_24ab/.karaṇabhatithayo 'rdhabhuktabhogāḥ svaphalakarā na bhavanti tatra sāmye/
analyzed: ardha bhukta bhogāḥ sva phala karāḥ na bhavanti tatra sāmye

original: VP_24cd/.karaṇatithivāsarodayānāṃ caraṇavivṛtthir anukramāt phalānām//
analyzed: caraṇa vivṛtthiḥ anukramāt phalānām

original: VP_25ab/.ṣaṭkāṣṭake maraṇavairaviyogadoṣā dvir dvādaśe nidhanatā 'prajātā trikoṇe/
analyzed: maraṇa vaira viyoga doṣāḥ dvis dvādaśe nidhana tā a prajātā trikoṇe

original: VP_25cd/.prītiḥ parā nigaditā samasaptakeṣu śeṣeṣv anekavidhasaukhyasutārthasaṃpat//
analyzed: parā nigaditā sama saptakeṣu śeṣeṣu anekavidha saukhya suta artha saṃpad

original: VP_26a/.ṣaṭkāṣṭake 'pi bhavanādhipam eva bhāva
analyzed: api bhavana adhipam eva bhāva

original: VP_26b/.ekādhipatyam avalokya ca vaśyarāśim/
analyzed: avalokya ca vaśya rāśim

original: VP_26c/.kāryo vivāhasamayaḥ śubhakṛt saduktaḥ
analyzed: vivāha samayaḥ śubha kṛt sat uktaḥ

original: VP_26d/.stārā [U. tārā] bhaved yadi parasparato 'nukūlā//
analyzed: tārā bhavet yadi parasparataḥ anukūlā

original: VP_27a/.dāridrayaṃ [U. dāridryaṃ] raviṇā kujena maraṇaṃ saumyena nasyuḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: u dāridryam raviṇā kujena maraṇam saumyena nasyuḥ prajāḥ

original: VP_27b/.daurbhāgyaṃ guruṇā sitena sahite candreṇa sāpatnikā/
analyzed: guruṇā sitena sahite candreṇa sāpatnikā

original: VP_27c/.pravrajyārkasutena sendujagurau vāñchanti kecit chubham
analyzed: sa indu ja gurau vāñchanti kecid śubham

original: VP_27d/.vyādhyair mṛtyur aṇaṃgrahair [U. asaṅgrahair] bahuvidhā dīkṣā pravāsāḥ śubhaiḥ//
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ a saṅgrahaiḥ bahuvidhā dīkṣā pravāsāḥ śubhaiḥ

original: VP_28ab/.kriye kumāreṣv anuraktacittā vihīnavittā gavi govratā ca/
analyzed: kumāreṣu anurakta cittā vihīna vittā gavi go vratā ca

original: VP_28cd/.kuladvayānandakarī tṛtīye kulīralagne kulaṭā nṛśaṃsā//
analyzed: tṛtīye kulīra lagne kulaṭā nṛśaṃsā

original: VP_29ab/.harau prasūtā sakṛd āśritā pituḥ patipriyā 'ti śvaśurasya ṣaṣṭhabhe/
analyzed: prasūtā sakṛt āśritā pituḥ pati priyā ati śvaśurasya ṣaṣṭha bhe

original: VP_29cd/.tulādimānārthavatī tulādhare tathālini krandati nityam asthirā//
analyzed: tulā dhare tathā alini krandati nityam asthirā

original: VP_30ab/.dhanuṣi kulaṭā tatpūrvārddhe satīty apare jaguḥ/
analyzed: kulaṭā tad pūrva arddhe satī iti apare jaguḥ

original: VP_30cd/.mṛgajhaṣaghaṭeṣv anyāśaktā jarām upagacchati//
analyzed: anya aśaktā jarām upagacchati

original: VP_31ab/.dvipadabhavanaprāpī yo 'ṃśaḥ sa śubho 'nyagṛhodaye/
analyzed: yaḥ aṃśaḥ sa śubhaḥ anya gṛha udaye

original: VP_31cd/.dvipadabhavaneṣv apy anyāṃśā na bhavanti śubhāvahā//
analyzed: api anya aṃśāḥ na bhavanti śubha āvahā

original: VP_32ab/.bhānur mṛtyur na bahudhanatāṃ bhartṛdāyād avittaṃ [U. vittaṃ] bandhudhvaṃsaṃ tanayavirahaṃ bhartṛvṛddhiṃ parāṃ ca/
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ na bahu dhana tām bhartṛ dāyāt avittam u vittam bandhu dhvaṃsam tanaya viraham bhartṛ vṛddhim parām ca

original: VP_32cd/.vaidhavyaṃ syān [U. prāk] na laghumaraṇaṃ dharmahāniṃ viśīlaṃ lābhānekān vyayam api dadāty udgamarkṣāt krameṇa//
analyzed: syān u prāk na laghu maraṇam dharma hānim viśīlam lābhān ekān vyayam api dadāti udgama ṛkṣāt krameṇa

original: VP_33ab/.śaśiny aśvā sārthā tad anu śubhatā bāndhavahitā viputrā bandhyārtā bhavati sasapatnā [U. sapatnā] ''śunidhanā/
analyzed: aśvā sārthā tat anu śubhatā bāndhava hitā viputrā bandhyā ārtā bhavati sa sapatnā u sapatnā āśu nidhanā

original: VP_33cd/.janitrī kanyānām atha vihatakarmā 'tidhaninī vyayāśaktety eke jagur aśubhadā bandhuṣu jale//
analyzed: kanyānām atha vihata karmā ati dhaninī vyaya aśaktā iti eke jaguḥ aśubha dā bandhuṣu jale

original: VP_34ab/.mṛtyur naiḥsvaṃ sārthatā bandhuvairaṃ na syuḥ putrā bhartṛvṛddhiṃ kumaitrīm/
analyzed: naiḥsvam sārtha tā bandhu vairam na syuḥ putrāḥ bhartṛ vṛddhim ku maitrīm

original: VP_34cd/.raktasrāvo nānukulye ca bhartuḥ kravyācchailyaṃ svāptināśaṃ ca bhaume//
analyzed: na anukulye ca bhartuḥ sva āpti nāśam ca bhaume

original: VP_35ab/.bhartṛvratā sugṛhiṇī patipakṣapūjyā bandhvarcitā bahusutā vijitāripakṣā/
analyzed: su gṛhiṇī pati pakṣa pūjyā bandhu arcitā bahu sutā vijita ari pakṣā

original: VP_35cd/.bandhyā vyasur niyamadānakṛśāṅgavittā māyāvatī dhanavatī vyayanīya [U. vyayanī] saumye//
analyzed: vyasuḥ niyama dāna kṛśa aṅga vittā māyāvatī dhanavatī vyayanīyaḥ u vyayanī saumye

original: VP_36ab/.patyuḥ priyā 'ti dhaninī muditā dhanyāḍhyā putrānvitā hataparā na sameti bhartā/
analyzed: priyā ati dhaninī muditā dhanya āḍhyā putra anvitā hata parā na sameti bhartā

original: VP_36cd/.kṣīṇāyuṣā śubharatā śubhasiddhakāryā svāyānvitā tadubhayopakṛtā ca jīve//
analyzed: śubha ratā śubha siddha kāryā tad ubhaya upakṛtā ca jīve

original: VP_37a/.priyā patyur lubdhā patisahajaśaktā kulahitā
analyzed: patyuḥ lubdhā pati sahaja śaktā kula hitā

original: VP_37b/.suputrā vairāḍhyā tad anu kulaṭā kṣipranidhanā/
analyzed: vaira āḍhyā tat anu kulaṭā kṣipra nidhanā

original: VP_37c/.ratā nityaṃ dharme bahukuśalakarmaṇy abhiratā
analyzed: nityam dharme bahu kuśala karmaṇi abhiratā

original: VP_37d/.bhavaty āyaprāyā kṣapitavibhavā ceti bhṛguṇā//
analyzed: āya prāyā kṣapita vibhavā ca iti bhṛguṇā

original: VP_38a/.puṃścaly asvā bahudhanavatī svalpadugdhārkaputre
analyzed: asvā bahu dhanavatī su alpa dugdha arka putre

original: VP_38b/.hṛdrogā''rtā vinihataparā garbhavisrāvaśīlā//
analyzed: vinihata parā garbha visrāva śīlā

original: VP_38c/.rogān muktā skhalitaniyamā pāpaśīlā 'tivittā
analyzed: muktā skhalita niyamā pāpa śīlā ati vittā

original: VP_38d/.pānair arthān nayati vilayaṃ prāvilagnāt krameṇa//
analyzed: arthān nayati vilayam prā vilagnāt krameṇa

original: VP_39ab/.saumyā vyayāstanidhanaṃ tryaribhaṃ ca śukre [U. śukraḥ] hitvā sthitas tridhanalābhagataḥ śaśāṅkaḥ/
analyzed: vyaya asta nidhanam tri aribham ca śukre u śukraḥ hitvā sthitaḥ tri dhana lābha gataḥ śaśāṅkaḥ

original: VP_39cd/.pāpā triṣaḍnidhanalābhagatā vivāhe hitvā 'ṣṭamaṃ kṣitijam iṣṭaphalāni dadyuḥ//
analyzed: triṣaṣ nidhana lābha gatāḥ vivāhe hitvā aṣṭamam kṣitijam iṣṭa phalāni dadyuḥ

original: VP_40ab/.sutahibukaviyadvilagnadharmeṣv amaragurur yadi dānavārcito vā/
analyzed: amara guruḥ yadi dānava arcitaḥ vā

original: VP_40cd/.yad aśubham upayāti tac chubhatvaṃ śubham api vṛddhim upaiti tatprabhāvāt//
analyzed: aśubham upayāti tat śubha tvam śubham api vṛddhim upaiti tad prabhāvāt

original: VP_41ab/.aniṣṭasthānasaṃstho 'pi praśastaphaladaḥ śaśiḥ/
analyzed: api praśasta phala daḥ śaśiḥ

original: VP_41cd/.saumyabhāge 'dhimitraṇa [U. 'dhimitreṇa] balinā cen nirīkṣtaḥ//
analyzed: adhimitraṇaḥ u adhimitreṇa balinā ced nirīkṣtaḥ

original: VP_42ab/.naragrahabale strīṇāṃ pumān bhavati ballabhaḥ/
analyzed: strīṇām pumān bhavati ballabhaḥ

original: VP_42cd/.viparīte 'ṅganā bhartur arthād anyat prakalpayet//
analyzed: aṅganā bhartuḥ arthāt anyat prakalpayet

original: VP_43ab/.śukrasūryāstapatiṣu śatrubhe vā tadaṃśake/
analyzed: śatru bhe vā tad aṃśake

original: VP_43cd/.virodhamūḍhā yāty āśu śvasruśvasurabhartṛṣu//
analyzed: yāti āśu śvasru śvasura bhartṛṣu

original: VP_44ab/.vilagnāṃśaḥ svanāthena yady udvāhe na dṛśyate/
analyzed: sva nāthena yadi udvāhe na dṛśyate

original: VP_44cd/.puṃvināśas tato 'stāṃśe yady evaṃ yoṣitas tathā//
analyzed: tatas asta aṃśe yadi evam yoṣitaḥ tathā

original: VP_45ab/.gurusitayor uccagayor ekatame vā vilagnage kanyā/
analyzed: ucca gayoḥ ekatame vā vilagna ge kanyā

original: VP_45cd/.rājñi bhavaty asaṃśayam eva gurusaumyayoś coḍhā//
analyzed: bhavati asaṃśayam eva guru saumyayoḥ ca ūḍhā

original: VP_46ab/.svajāmitrodaye lagne śubhe kāryā caturthikā/
analyzed: lagne śubhe kāryā caturthikā

original: VP_46cd/.svavarṇasadṛśā jārās tryādyair ekarkṣasaṃsthitaiḥ//
analyzed: jārāḥ tri ādyaiḥ eka ṛkṣa saṃsthitaiḥ

original: VP_47ab/.carabhavanagataṃ vihāya satyaḥ śaśinam uvāca śubhapradaṃ vivāhe/
analyzed: vihāya satyaḥ śaśinam uvāca śubha pradam vivāhe

original: VP_47cd/.munivacanavirodhi tac ca sūtre na tu kathite pavanarkṣavaiśvadeve//
analyzed: tat ca sūtre na tu kathite pavana ṛkṣa vaiśvadeve

original: VP_48ab/.rāśyudgamadvādaśarāśicakre yuktā vivāhā munibhiḥ pradiṣṭā/
analyzed: yuktā vivāhā munibhiḥ pradiṣṭā

original: VP_48cd/.nāmāni cakre grahayogalagne śrīdevakīrtiḥ śṛṇu tasya ca ''ryā//
VP_49ab/.nando bhadro jīvo jīmūtaḥ sthāvaro jayo vijayaḥ/
analyzed: bhadraḥ jīvaḥ jīmūtaḥ sthāvaraḥ jayaḥ vijayaḥ

original: VP_49cd/.vyālo rasātalamukhaḥ kṣayas tamo 'ntyo vivāhagaṇaḥ//
VP_50ab/.saumye vilagne nandaḥ śukre bhadras tathā gurau jīvaḥ/
analyzed: vilagne nandaḥ śukre bhadraḥ tathā gurau jīvaḥ

original: VP_50cd/.ādyantau jīmūtaḥ sthāvara iti madhyamāntyābhyām//
analyzed: jīmūtaḥ sthāvaraḥ iti madhyama antyābhyām

original: VP_51ab/.saumyair atha tair vā ravibhaumaśanaiścaraiḥ kramaśaḥ/
analyzed: atha taiḥ vā ravi bhauma śanaiścaraiḥ kramaśas

original: VP_51cd/.saumyaiḥ jñeyā saumyā krūrāḥ kruraiḥ [U. krūraiḥ] samākhyātā//
analyzed: jñeyā saumyā krūrāḥ kruraiḥ u krūraiḥ samākhyātā

original: VP_52ab/.dinakarayogād vyālo bhaumena rasātalaḥ kṣayaḥ śaninā/
analyzed: vyālaḥ bhaumena rasātalaḥ kṣayaḥ śaninā

original: VP_52cd/.tamasā tamo nirukto 'thāntye keto [U. ketor] kṛtāntaś ca//
analyzed: tamaḥ niruktaḥ atha antye keto u ketoḥ kṛtāntaḥ ca

original: VP_53ab/.triṣu nandādiṣu rājñī caturṣu cātaḥ paraṃ mahādevī/
analyzed: nanda ādiṣu rājñī caturṣu ca atas param mahādevī

original: VP_53cd/.vyālādyeṣu ca pañcaṣu vidhavāḥ śocyā daridrāś ca//
analyzed: ca pañcaṣu vidhavāḥ śocyāḥ daridrāḥ ca

original: VP_54ab/.anadhikṛtaḥ śubhakṛt syād ete [U. etaiś] candro 'nyathā 'dhikṛtaḥ/
analyzed: śubha kṛt syāt ete u etaiḥ candraḥ anyathā adhikṛtaḥ

original: VP_54cd/.tasmāt vivāhasamaye na kena cit saṅgataḥ śaśī dhanyaḥ//
analyzed: vivāha samaye na kena cit saṅgataḥ śaśī dhanyaḥ

original: VP_55ab/.sapta te śaśiyogā saumyā [U. saumyaiḥ] saha sarvakarmasiddhikarāḥ/
analyzed: te śaśi yogāḥ saumyāḥ u saumyaiḥ saha sarva karma siddhi karāḥ

original: VP_55cd/.aśubhaphaladās tu pāpaiḥ patyudvahane vivarjyās te//
analyzed: tu pāpaiḥ pati udvahane vivarjyāḥ te

original: VP_55ef/.tasmād etān yogān matimāṃ[sic.] sañcivtya [U. yuñjīta] sarvakāryeṣu/
analyzed: etān yogān matimāṃsic sañcivtya u yuñjīta sarva kāryeṣu

original: VP_56ab/.ūḍhā nande kanyā devīśabdaṃ samāpnuyād acirāt//
VP_56cd/.bhavati narendrajananī bhartuḥ prāṇaiḥ priyā caiva/
analyzed: narendra jananī bhartuḥ prāṇaiḥ priyā ca eva

original: VP_57ab/.bhadre pāṇigrahaṇe yadi nāma kumārikā samupayāti//
analyzed: pāṇigrahaṇe yadi nāma kumārikā samupayāti

original: VP_57cd/.sā tvaritān nṛpaśabdaṃ karoti bhārtuḥ kulasyāpi/
analyzed: tvaritāt nṛpa śabdam karoti bhārtuḥ kulasya api

original: VP_58ab/.pariṇītā jīvākhye kanyā vijayāya kīrtyate bhartuḥ//
analyzed: jīva ākhye kanyā vijayāya kīrtyate bhartuḥ

original: VP_58cd/.prāpnoti sā trivargaṃ kuladvayaṃ cāpi nandayati/
analyzed: sā trivargam kula dvayam ca api nandayati

original: VP_59ab/.jīmūte pariṇītā vipulān bhogān mahāphalān bhuktvā//
analyzed: pariṇītā vipulān bhogān mahā phalān bhuktvā

original: VP_59cd/.dṛṣdvā ca naptṛtanayān sahabhartā devatvam/
analyzed: ca naptṛ tanayān saha bhartā deva tvam

original: VP_60ab/.sthāvarayoge kanyā pāṇigraham etya vipulam aiśvaryam//
analyzed: kanyā pāṇigraham etya vipulam aiśvaryam

original: VP_60cd/.bhartur nidhānalābhān prāpya kulasyonnatiṃ kurute/
analyzed: nidhāna lābhān prāpya kulasya unnatim kurute

original: VP_61ab/.pāṇigraham etya jaye jaghanyakulajāpi bhartur aiśvaryam//
analyzed: etya jaye jaghanya kula jā api bhartuḥ aiśvaryam

original: VP_61cd/.āvahati sadā kanyā niṣevyamānā sapatnībhiḥ/
analyzed: sadā kanyā niṣevyamānā sapatnībhiḥ

original: VP_62ab/.vijayāṃ prāpyodvāhaṃ prāpnoti sutān yaśo 'rthalābhaṃ ca//
analyzed: prāpya udvāham prāpnoti sutān yaśaḥ artha lābham ca

original: VP_62cd/.vaṃśasya ca pratiṣṭhāṃ parato maraṇāc ca suralokam/
analyzed: ca pratiṣṭhām paratas maraṇāt ca sura lokam

original: VP_63ab/.vyāle vyālākārā pāṇigraham eti kanyakā daivāt//
analyzed: vyāla ākārā pāṇigraham eti kanyakā daivāt

original: VP_63cd/.dāridryāmayayuktā naikasmin puṃsi sā ramate/
analyzed: na ekasmin puṃsi sā ramate

original: VP_64ab/.pātālanāmani gatā pāṇigrahaṇe ca pañcamān māsāt//
analyzed: gatā pāṇigrahaṇe ca pañcamāt māsāt

original: VP_64cd/.sā prāpya doṣam atulaṃ paraḥ prāṇān parityajati/
analyzed: prāpya doṣam atulam paraḥ prāṇān parityajati

original: VP_65ab/.kṣayam āsādyodvāhaṃ kanyā pakṣadvayāt patiṃ hatvā//
analyzed: āsādya udvāham kanyā pakṣa dvayāt patim hatvā

original: VP_65cd/.nīcena tu saha bhartrā kṣapayati jārāgninā gotram/
analyzed: tu saha bhartrā kṣapayati jāra agninā gotram

original: VP_66ab/.pāṇigrahas tamasi cel lakṣaṇaguṇavittato 'pi sampannā//
analyzed: tamasi ced lakṣaṇa guṇa vittataḥ api sampannā

original: VP_66cd/.saptati rātrāt kṣapayati yady api jātā surendreṇa/
analyzed: rātrāt kṣapayati yadi api jātā sura indreṇa

original: VP_67ab/.yadi khalu kṛtāntayoge pariṇayam āyati kanyakā daivāt//
analyzed: khalu kṛtānta yoge pariṇayam āyati kanyakā daivāt

original: VP_67cd/.sā śvasurabandhuvargaṃ kṣapayaty acireṇa kālena/
analyzed: śva sura bandhu vargam kṣapayati acireṇa kālena

original: VP_68ab/.ātmopekṣakapoṣakavadhakā iti rāśayo 'rthato 'bhihitaḥ//
analyzed: iti rāśayaḥ arthataḥ abhihitaḥ

original: VP_68cd/.ebhyaḥ śubham aśubhaṃ vā nirdeśyā janmalagnābhyām/
analyzed: śubham aśubham vā nirdeśyāḥ janma lagnābhyām

original: VP_69ab/.ātmeti janmalagnaṃ pañcama navamaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ tasmāt//
analyzed: janma lagnam ca kīrtitam tasmāt

original: VP_69cd/.dviṣaṭkadaśamabhavanam upekṣakākhyaṃ vinirdiṣṭam//
analyzed: upekṣaka ākhyam vinirdiṣṭam

original: VP_70ab/.duścikyaṃ jāmitraṃ caikādaśakaṃ ca poṣakaṃ jñeyam//
analyzed: jāmitram ca ekādaśakam ca poṣakam jñeyam

original: VP_70cd/.dvādaśanidhanacaturthaṃ vadhakākhyaṃ śāstranirdiṣṭam/
analyzed: vadhaka ākhyam śāstra nirdiṣṭam

original: VP_71ab/.hitvā śaśāṅkaṃ yadi sapta saumyaiḥ pañcāśubhaiḥ kiṃ kathitā na saptā//
analyzed: śaśāṅkam yadi sapta saumyaiḥ pañca aśubhaiḥ kim kathitāḥ na saptā

original: VP_71cd/.dvitryādiyogān parihṛtya kasmān noktaṃ śataṃ trighanaṃ vilagne/
analyzed: parihṛtya kasmāt na uktam śatam tri ghanam vilagne

original: VP_72ab/.deśācāras tāvad ādau vicintyo deśe deśe yā sthiti saiva kāryā//
analyzed: tāvat ādau vicintyaḥ deśe deśe yā sthiti sā eva kāryā

original: VP_72cd/.lokadviṣṭāṃ paṇḍitā varjayanti daivajño 'pi lokamārgeṇa yāyāt/
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ varjayanti daiva jñaḥ api loka mārgeṇa yāyāt

original: VP_73ab/.bṛhaspatau gocaraśobhanasthe vivāham icchanti ca dakṣiṇātyāḥ/
analyzed: gocara śobhana sthe vivāham icchanti ca dakṣiṇātyāḥ

original: VP_73cd/.ravau śubhasthe ca vadanti gauḍā na gocaro mālavake pramāṇam//
analyzed: śubhasthe ca vadanti gauḍāḥ na gocaraḥ mālavake pramāṇam

original: VP_74ab/.harau prasupte na ca dakṣiṇāyane na caitramāse na ca puṣyasaṃjñite/
analyzed: prasupte na ca dakṣiṇāyane na caitra māse na ca puṣya saṃjñite

original: VP_74cd/.tithau ca rikte śaśini kṣayaṅgate ravīndubhaumārkidineṣu cāśubham//
analyzed: ca rikte śaśini ravi indu bhauma arki dineṣu ca aśubham

original: VP_75ab/.vyatipātahataṃ dinatrayaṃ vyatipātena samaṃ ca vaidhṛtim//
VP_75cd/.tad api sphuṭapātadarśane dviguṇaṃ yadi vā na niścitam/
analyzed: api sphuṭa pāta darśane dviguṇam yadi vā na niścitam

original: VP_76ab/.vyatipātavyāghātaḥ ṣaṣṭhe daśame ca vaidhṛtaṃ dhiṣṇye//
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe daśame ca vaidhṛtam dhiṣṇye

original: VP_76cd/.vikṣobhaṇagaṇḍāntāv atidhṛtisaṃkhye ca vyāghātaḥ/
analyzed: atidhṛti saṃkhye ca vyāghātaḥ

original: VP_77ab/.tad idaṃ vyatipātaṃ ca kathayanti uttaradiksthitājanāḥ//
analyzed: idam vyatipātam ca kathayanti uttara diś sthitā janāḥ

original: VP_77cd/.vyatipātavad ākulasthitaṃ bahusiddhāntaviśeṣakāraṇe/
analyzed: ākula sthitam bahu siddhānta viśeṣa kāraṇe

original: VP_78ab/.tathottarāḥ sākalasannikṛṣṭā māṇḍavyamātīyatusārddhakeṣu//
analyzed: sākala sannikṛṣṭā māṇḍavya mātīya tusārddhakeṣu

original: VP_78cd/.khaśeṣu hūṇeṣu na bāhlikeṣu vā na,
analyzed: hūṇeṣu na bāhlikeṣu vā na

original: kāṇadeśeṣu na gopabhojāḥ/
analyzed: kāṇa deśeṣu na gopa bhojāḥ

original: VP_79ab/.ekādaśoktāni śubhāni bhāni śeṣāṇy aniṣṭāni vivāhakāle//
analyzed: śubhāni bhāni śeṣāṇi aniṣṭāni vivāha kāle

original: VP_79cd/.tatrāgni [U. tatrāpi] tārā śaśivīryayuktā triṃśan muhūrtāś ca vicintanīyāḥ/
analyzed: tatra api tārā śaśi vīrya yuktā triṃśat muhūrtāḥ ca vicintanīyāḥ

original: VP_80ab/.tulādharastrīmithunād vivāha [U. vihāya] lagne sthitā pāpaphalā na cānye//
analyzed: vivāhaḥ vihāya lagne sthitā pāpa phalā na ca anye

original: VP_80cd/.triṃśāṃśakadvādaśabhāgabhedair dreṣkāṇahorāpramukhair vicintyaḥ/
analyzed: dreṣkāṇa horā pramukhaiḥ vicintyaḥ

original: VP_81ab/.māse nāṣṭāu viṣṭiduṣṭāni bhāni tatrāpy eke rātrim āhur dinaṃ ca//
analyzed: na aṣṭau viṣṭi duṣṭāni bhāni tatra api eke rātrim āhuḥ dinam ca

original: VP_81cd/.tithyarddhe 'ntye prāptināśau ca viṣṭe [U. viṣṭeḥ] cāndraṃ mānaṃ viṣṭihetu na śeṣam/
analyzed: antye prāpti nāśau ca viṣṭe viṣṭeḥ cāndram mānam viṣṭi hetu na śeṣam

original: VP_82ab/.prācyāḥ prāyoḥ nyūnavarṇāḥ sagopāḥ saṃdhyākālaṃ prāhur iṣṭaṃ na śeṣam//
analyzed: prāyoḥ nyūna varṇāḥ sa gopāḥ saṃdhyā kālam prāhuḥ iṣṭam na śeṣam

original: VP_82cd/.yāvac chāntaṃ gorajo nābhyupeti tāvat teṣāṃ cittaśuddhir vivāhe/
analyzed: chāntam go rajaḥ na abhyupeti tāvat teṣām citta śuddhiḥ vivāhe

original: VP_83a/.gopair yaṣṭayāhatānāṃ [U. yaṣṭyāhatānāṃ] khurapuṭadalitā yā tu dhūlir dinānte
analyzed: yaṣṭayā āhatānām yaṣṭi āhatānām khura puṭa dalitā yā tu dhūliḥ dina ante

original: VP_83b/.sodvāhe sundarīṇāṃ vipuladhanasutāś cāyurārogyasaṃpat//
analyzed: sundarīṇām vipula dhana sutāḥ ca āyuḥ ārogya saṃpad

original: VP_83c/.tasmin kāle na ca rkṣaṃ na ca tithikaraṇaṃ naiva lagnaṃ na yogaḥ
analyzed: kāle na ca ṛkṣam na ca tithi karaṇam na eva lagnam na yogaḥ

original: VP_83d/.khyātaḥ puṃsāṃ sukhārthaṃ śamayati duritāni utthitaṃ gorajas tu/
analyzed: puṃsām sukha artham śamayati duritāni utthitam go rajaḥ tu

original: VP_84ab/.kulasya deśasya ca cittavṛttir na khaṇḍaniyā [U. khaṇḍanīyā] viduṣā kadācit//
analyzed: deśasya ca citta vṛttiḥ na khaṇḍaniyā u khaṇḍanīyā viduṣā kadācid

original: VP_84cd/.dosaḥ pratisyāyakṛto 'pi yo 'tra saṃbhāvyate jyautiṣikasya so 'jñaiḥ/
analyzed: pratisyāya kṛtaḥ api yaḥ atra saṃbhāvyate jyautiṣikasya saḥ ajñaiḥ

original: VP_85ab/.śāstraśarīram abudhvā bahudhā jalpanti yady api nānumatam//
analyzed: a budhvā bahudhā jalpanti yadi api na anumatam

original: VP_85cd/.kāṇānāṃ viṣayagataḥ prājño nimilayen netram/
VP_86ab/.evaṃ vivāhasamaye gamane praveśe kāryeṣu maṅgalayuteṣv athavā pareṣu//
analyzed: vivāha samaye gamane praveśe kāryeṣu maṅgala yuteṣu athavā pareṣu

original: VP_86cd/.doṣaṃ kuśikṣitakudaivavido vadanti rāgeṇa vā paṭudhiyo namo 'stu tebhyaḥ/
analyzed: ku śikṣita ku daiva vidaḥ vadanti rāgeṇa vā paṭu dhiyaḥ namaḥ astu tebhyaḥ

original: VP_87ab/.gocaraśuddhāv induṃ kanyāyā yatnataḥ śubhaṃ vīkṣya//
analyzed: indum kanyāyāḥ yatnataḥ śubham vīkṣya

original: VP_87cd/.tigmakiraṇaś ca puṃsaḥ śeṣair avarṇair api vivāhaḥ/
analyzed: ca puṃsaḥ śeṣaiḥ avarṇaiḥ api vivāhaḥ

original: VP_88ab/.na sakalaguṇasaṃpal labhyate 'lpair ahobhir bahutaraguṇayogaṃ yojayet maṅgaleṣu//
analyzed: sakala guṇa saṃpad labhyate alpaiḥ ahobhiḥ bahutara guṇa yogam yojayet maṅgaleṣu

original: VP_88cd/.prabhavati na hi doṣo bhūribhāve guṇānāṃ salilalava ivāgneḥ saṃpradīptendhanasya/
analyzed: na hi doṣaḥ bhūri bhāve guṇānām salila lavaḥ iva agneḥ saṃpradīpta indhanasya

original: VP_89ab/.guṇaśatam api doṣaḥ kaścid eko 'pi vṛddhaḥ kṣapayati yadi nānyat tadvirodhiguṇo 'sti/
analyzed: api doṣaḥ kaścid ekaḥ api vṛddhaḥ kṣapayati yadi na anyat tad virodhi guṇaḥ asti

original: VP_89cd/.ghaṭam api paripūrṇaṃ pañcagavyasya śaktyā malinayati surāyā bindur eko 'pi sarvam//
analyzed: api paripūrṇam pañcagavyasya śaktyā malinayati surāyāḥ binduḥ ekaḥ api sarvam

original: VP_90ab/.kṛtakautukamaṅgalo varo madhuparkādyaśanād anantaram//
analyzed: varaḥ madhuparka ādi aśanāt anantaram

original: VP_90cd/.jvalitāgnisamakṣamaṅgalaṃ yad avāpnoti śubhāśubhaṃ ca tam//
analyzed: yat avāpnoti śubha aśubham ca tam

original: VP_91ab/.cakre varāhamihiraḥ praṇipatya sādhūn samyak vivāhapaṭalaṃ pṛthutāṃ vihāya/
analyzed: varāhamihiraḥ praṇipatya sādhūn samyak vivāha paṭalam pṛthu tām vihāya

original: VP_91cd/.pūrvaṃ ca yad yuvatijanmavidhau mayoktaṃ saṃcintya tac ca sadasatparikalpanīyam//
analyzed: ca yat yuvati janma vidhau mayā uktam saṃcintya tat ca sat asat parikalpanīyam

original: End of Vivahapatala
analyzed: end or vivaha patala
